WRITING.TITLE: My denim jeans keep tearing at the crotch.
WRITING.TEXT: I've been trying to lose weight since March I think. I've started at 238 lbs at 6 ft tall, and I've been jogging/walking about 3 miles every other day. I weigh myself about once or twice a week, and one time I weighed 231 lbs, then I stepped on again, and I was at 236 lbs, and again at 235 lbs. I keep doing this and now I don't know if I've even lost any weight at all since March. Now I've discovered a tear at the crotch of my pants, and I'm just so fucking bummed, man. I've been wearing a pair of pants for a week because all my other pants don't fit. The 3 that do fit, one had a tear in the crotch, which inspired this weight loss crusade, and now another does too. I'm down to one pair of pants that I can comfortably wear that doesn't have a tear in it. This fucking sucks.
oh yeah, that's a real hilarious joke/s
